ThingDef.Name: TechscrollBase
ThingDef.description: A plasteel-polymer storage device which houses an extensive sheet of gold alloy weave, every inch of the substrate is etched with microscopic lines of data which when read correctly can grant your researchers the required information to complete a specific research project.

li.completedLetterText: By painstakingly translating and studying the {PARENT_label}, {STUDIER_labelShort} has learned the ancient secrets needed for the research project(s) {RESEARCH}.\n\nYour researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to actually use the technology.

ThingDef.label: armor techscroll
ThingDef.description: A plasteel-polymer storage device which houses an extensive sheet of gold alloy weave, every inch of the substrate is etched with microscopic lines of data which when read correctly can grant your researchers the required information to complete a specific research project.\n\nThis scroll appears to be contain knowledge on powerful dwarven power-armors, capable of stopping the mightiest of blows.

ThingDef.label: weapons techscroll
ThingDef.description: A plasteel-polymer storage device which houses an extensive sheet of gold alloy weave, every inch of the substrate is etched with microscopic lines of data which when read correctly can grant your researchers the required information to complete a specific research project.\n\nThis scroll appears to be contain knowledge on legendary dwarven weapons, from simple axes and hammers to unique ranged weaponry.

ThingDef.label: medical techscroll
ThingDef.description: A plasteel-polymer storage device which houses an extensive sheet of gold alloy weave, every inch of the substrate is etched with microscopic lines of data which when read correctly can grant your researchers the required information to complete a specific research project.\n\nThis scroll appears to be contain knowledge on advanced dwarven bionics, some that can spit fire or stun mechanoids, and some that can enhance the physical capabilities of the subject.
